edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.morph

Class MorphologicalFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.Filter
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.morph.MorphologicalFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClosingFilter, DilationFilter, ErosionFilter, OpeningFilter

    public abstract class MorphologicalFilter
extends Filter
    A Filter representing a binary morphological filter in an arbitrary (i.e. up to 5) number of dimensions.

    A MorphologicalFilter processes an Image using a StructuringElement for the morphological operation.

    Eventually MorphologicalFilters will implement processing greyscale images, but only binary filters are currently implemented.

      • setProcessAsBinary

        public void setProcessAsBinary(boolean isBinary)
        Sets whether this filter processes images as binary or greyscale.

        Currently does not affect anything; all images are processed as binary.

        Parameters:
        isBinary - Whether the filter should act as if all images are binary.
